targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "framerate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "instant")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["server"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  avg(instant)
FROM framerate
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "frametime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "instant")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))

targets.rawSql:

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "players")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count" or r._field == "joining" or r._field == "queued")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["server", "_field"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  avg(count) as count,
  avg(joining) as joining,
  avg(queued) as queued
FROM players
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "allocations" or r._field == "collections" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["server", "_field"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  avg(used) as used,
  avg(collections) as collections,
  avg(allocations) as allocations
FROM memory
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tasks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "invoke_handler" or r._field == "load_balancer" or r._field == "workshop_skins_queue")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  avg(load_balancer) as load_balancer,
  avg(invoke_handler) as invoke_handler,
  avg(workshop_skins_queue) as workshop_skins_queue
FROM tasks
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "connection_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["server"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  avg(ping) as ping
FROM connection_latency
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "network")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_received" or r._field == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["server", "_field"], mode: "by")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  avg(bytes_sent) as Tx,
  avg(bytes_received) as Rx
FROM network
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "network_updates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.server, set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  server,
  sum("0") as "0",
  sum(Welcome) as Welcome,
  sum(Auth) as Auth,
  sum(Approved) as Approved,
  sum(Ready) as Ready,
  sum(Entities) as Entities,
  sum(EntityDestroy) as EntityDestroy,
  sum(GroupChange) as GroupChange,
  sum(GroupDestroy) as GroupDestroy,
  sum(RPCMessage) as RPCMessage,
  sum(EntityPosition) as EntityPosition,
  sum(ConsoleMessage) as ConsoleMessage,
  sum(ConsoleCommand) as ConsoleCommand,
  sum(Effect) as Effect,
  sum(DisconnectReason) as DisconnectReason,
  sum(Tick) as Tick,
  sum(Message) as Message,
  sum(RequestUserInformation) as RequestUserInformation,
  sum(GiveUserInformation) as GiveUserInformation,
  sum(GroupEnter) as GroupEnter,
  sum(GroupLeave) as GroupLeave,
  sum(VoiceData) as VoiceData,
  sum(EAC) as EAC,
  sum(EntityFlags) as EntityFlags,
  sum(World) as World,
  sum(ConsoleReplicatedVars) as ConsoleReplicatedVars
FROM network_updates
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND server IN (${server})
SAMPLE BY $__interval
